monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Pulls player towards a grappling anchor
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Antitoxins
skills.description: At the beginning of each turn, heal a random Debuff from this Monster.

skills.name: Assistance
skills.description: Every heal that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 10% chance to apply Sidekick (Buff).

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Bite
skills.description: 2 x 170% (340%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 2 x (50 + 40% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 3 x (50 + 30% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 125% (500%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 4 x (75 + 25% Attack)

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Channeled Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (400 + 40% Magic + 40% Max Mana) Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Channeling Balance
skills.description: Unique Aura: Channel Buff also increases the damage dealt by 6% and reduces the damage taken by 6%.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.description: 8 x 75% (600%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether and Blind.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Extra Channel
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party gains a non-Channel Buff, 15% chance they also gain Channel.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Hades
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff) or Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Initial Poison
skills.description: Apply Poison (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Multi Channel
skills.description: Aura: Channel (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overheal
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Poison Eater
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Eater Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Severe Upkeep
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison or Burn (Debuff) damage, 50% chance to inflict a Wound stack on them.

skills.name: Shroud
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Volley
skills.description: 2 x 50% (100%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Slime Volley Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Sticky Impact
skills.description: Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Tether. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Sticky Threads
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Threads Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Threads Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Web
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Web Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies 2 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Toxic Feedback
skills.description: Heal for 5% of Max Health at the start of each turn for each Poison on enemies.

skills.name: Venomous Fangs
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness or Poison. This Monster can stack these Debuffs one additional time.

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
